project_descr: Joint Implementation Review of the Lao PDR's Avian Influenza Control and Pandemic Preparedness Plan 2006-2010

outputs.output_descr:
Project supports strengthening the function of the national Communicable Disease Control Committee through a variety of activities, developing a national stockpile of essential supplies, developing financial and legal frameworks and the NEIDCO programme management. 

UNORC contribution for 2008 and 2009 has been the administrative salaries of two staff (Nang and Toon). This commitment ends on December 2009 and financial support for multi-secotral planning and IEC material.

project_title: avian and human influenza (ahi) coordination support
